divs: Sighting Detailssome friends of mine and me, we where on the beach, it was a summer warm night, it was late at night and we were going to go back home, so when we where beside our cars one of us said: what's that?,i said: an airplane i think, my friend says: i don't think so, ist so high and its going so fast. i have to say that it wasnt a lineal flight, it was like drawing eights. that's happend in a 30 seconds aprox. then, that light with a cigarr form, stay suspended on air for a couple of minutes,and with a higher light disappear.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Elche
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Very fast very lightly and it disappear in a second after stay suspended on air over 30 sec.
